overview: Dialogue free and universal in its story-telling, Stood Up is a short film filled with memories of happily ever afters and love at first sight.  Charming, loyal and perpetually single Ben is tired of always being the best friend and wing-man. After deciding to shake things up, he agrees to a blind date. But, when things go awry, will fate step in and save him from forever being friend-zoned?
title: Stood Up
